block.p: American League BOSTON RED SOX--Announced the retirement of C Dave Nilsson. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Agreed to terms with OF Raul Ibanez on a one-year contract.
American League BOSTON RED SOX--Announced the retirement of C Dave Nilsson. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Agreed to terms with OF Raul Ibanez on a one-year contract.

National League COLORADO ROCKIES--Agreed to terms with RHP Jose Jimenez on a one-year contract. Claimed RHP Elio Serrano off waivers from Philadelphia. FLORIDA MARLINS--Agreed to terms with OF Al Martin on a minor league contract. NEW YORK METS--Signed RHP David Cone to a minor league contract. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Waived RHP Elio Serrano. Purchased the contract of C Todd Pratt from Scranton/Wilkes Barre of the International League.

Continental Basketball Association GARY STEELHEADS--Signed F Junior Burrough. GREAT LAKES STORM--Signed C Marvin Gay. IDAHO STAMPEDE--Signed F Darius Beard. Women's National Basketball Association CHARLOTTE STING--Named Bernie Bickerstaff vice president and general manager. Promoted assistant coach Trudi Lacey to coach.

National Football League ARIZONA CARDINALS--Signed RB Damien Anderson, PK Tim Duncan and DB Quentin Harris to one-year contracts. CAROLINA PANTHERS--Named Sal Sunseri defensive line coach and Mike Trgovac defensive coordinator. DETROIT LIONS--Named Kevin O'Dea assistant special teams coach. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed WR Martin Dossett. HOUSTON TEXANS--Signed DE John Gilmore. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Named Glenn Pires assistant defensive line coach. MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed KR-RB John Avery. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Named Jerry Palmieri assistant strength and conditioning coach.
